message.content:
s0:Understanding Inner Child|Discover the wounded child within and begin your healing journey
s1:Signs of Inner Child Wounds|Recognize emotional triggers, perfectionism, and people-pleasing patterns
s2:Healing Through Self-Compassion|Practice gentle self-talk and embrace your inner child with love
s3:Reparenting Techniques|Learn to provide the care and validation your inner child needs
s4:Integration and Growth|Merge your inner child with your adult self for wholeness

Slide 1: Visual: Soft pastel background with child silhouette and gentle light rays | Copy: "Meet your inner child - the part of you that still needs love" | CTA: "Take a moment to breathe and connect"
Slide 2: Visual: Split screen showing emotional triggers and healing symbols | Copy: "These patterns protect you, but they also limit you" | CTA: "Identify one trigger today"
Slide 3: Visual: Warm embrace illustration with heart symbols | Copy: "Speak to yourself as you would to a beloved child" | CTA: "Practice one kind word to yourself"
Slide 4: Visual: Adult and child hands reaching toward each other | Copy: "You have the power to reparent yourself" | CTA: "Start with one small act of self-care"
Slide 5: Visual: Butterfly emerging from cocoon with growth symbols | Copy: "Integration brings wholeness and authentic living" | CTA: "Celebrate your healing journey"

recommendedOrder: 1. Review all slide content and visual descriptions
2. Gather visual assets (photos, icons, brand elements)
3. Create slides in batch (use consistent design)
4. Add text overlays with trauma-informed language

costAnalysis.efficiency: Excellent - specialized carousel creation with visual guidance

qualityChecklist: ✅ Visual descriptions are clear and actionable
✅ Text is accessible and easy to read
